thread.title: Author and CEO Wayne Harris featured on CBS as Guest on Get Real with Kristie Frank
thread.title_full: Author and CEO Wayne Harris featured on CBS as Guest on Get Real with Kristie Frank | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Author and CEO Wayne Harris featured on CBS as Guest on Get Real with Kristie Frank
text:
(MENAFN Press)  
Wayne Harris was recently seen on NBC CBS ABC and FOX network affiliates around the country as a guest on Get Real with Kristie Frank. 
Orlando FL – August 3 2015— Wayne Harris author and CEO was recently featured as a guest on Get Real with Kristie Frank. The show was filmed in Orlando Florida features an interview with Kristie Frank.
Wayne is known as a perceptive thinker.  He has lead companies to great success with recognition on the Inc. 500 list received letters of recognition numerous sales achievement awards and personal service awards.
Wayne believes that salesmanship can be ethical powerful and personal all at the same time.  Through The Humble Salesman workshops and turnkey sales systems Wayne is out to change public view on salespeople.  He firmly believes negative public perception of your team can be changed while increasing the effectiveness of your salespeople. The work he puts forth to educate and build true sales professionals has a greater purpose. 
Watch Wayne Harris’ appearance on “Get Real with Kristie Frank” :
To learn more about Wayne and his services please visit 
More About Wayne Harris 
Wayne volunteers his talents while serving on the board of Armonia US a non-profit organization. For over thirty years Armonia has worked diligently to break the poverty cycle of the indigenous people of Mexico.
Wayne writes books conducts conferences and leads seminars so that others can have the opportunity to make a large impact on the world we live in.
